input.sentences: i went for a walk around town .
i saw a lot of abandoned buildings there .
there was a lot of garbage everywhere .
there was nobody in the park .
i came home and found a note from my friend .
output.sentences: The small white pickup truck was advertising a furniture sale in another part of town.
The furniture sale was in a part of town that was lacking many businesses still in business.
One of the items for sale was cheap sun glasses in a variety of colors.
There was fences around many of the properties to keep them safe.
The restrooms were in such bad shape that the lock on the bathroom door won't always open.
